explanation: [0-0] A group of young men are in a room, sitting on a light brown sofa. The person standing on the far left is wearing a black hoodie and blue jeans, his right hand in his pants pocket, and his left hand holding a black cell phone, head slightly lowered. The other men on the sofa are all looking at their phones. One of them, wearing a white top, is holding a glass bowl of potato chips. There are white captions at the top of the screen.
[0-3] Next, the young man in the black sweatshirt on the left is looking at his phone intently in his right hand, then he nods.
[0-3] Next, the young man in the black sweatshirt on the left is looking at his phone intently in his right hand, then he nods.
[0-3] Next, the young man in the black sweatshirt on the left is looking at his phone intently in his right hand, then he nods.

[3-6] Immediately afterwards, he suddenly raised his head, raised the phone in his hand, and then the phone smashed onto the man in the black short sleeves who was sitting on the sofa next to him. The man covered his forehead, opened his mouth in pain, and then twisted slightly to the right. The other men sitting on the sofa on the right also opened their mouths in surprise and looked at the man in the black shirt on the left.
